summary: This Mod includes the original Nightingale Armor and Shrouded Armor in the game. The armors are completely craftable and not enchanted.
descriptionHtml:
This Mod includes the original Nightingale Armor and Shrouded Armor in the game. The armors are completely craftable and not enchanted.

TO GET THE ARMORS:

1. You need the perk for daedric smithing.

2. You must have the original armors, (finish the quests to get the original armors)

INSTALLATION:

Copy all the .esp files in your (Skyrim/Data) folder.

C:Program Files (x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/Data
author: Christian8624
